name: Battle on Pixel Hill
description:
Controls:

Press WAD to switch between Top, Front, and Side View respectively.

Top View: Click to drop a bomb at the reticle location

Side View: Click to Shoot an enemy that the reticle is over

Front View: When glowing, the green button can be pressed to pull up a lane-aim screen. Click on the lane to fire a railgun shot through the selected lane.

Current WebGL issues: Top view reticle is offset, must enter full-screen mode to find reticle. Side View raycasting does not work at the moment.
